channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The peak interest rate era is over. Here's what investors are watching
item.description: The U.S. Federal Reserve is about to join the European Central Bank, the Bank of England, the People's Bank of China and others in cutting key rates.

item.title: What’s worth streaming in September: ‘Slow Horses,’ ‘The Penguin’ and more
Defense stocks in an ESG portfolio? A profound — and controversial — shift seems to be underway
item.description: The idea of including defense stocks in sustainably-minded portfolios remains controversial.

item.title: What’s worth streaming in September 2024: ‘Slow Horses,’ ‘The Penguin’ and more
BYD sales hit a record in August despite broader China EV slowdown
item.description: Chinese electric car giant BYD sold a record number of passenger vehicles in August, with sales of hybrids growing faster than those of battery-only c...

item.title: New report offers more details into Intel’s possible plans to slash costs
Has Boeing shaken your confidence to fly? A new MIT study could restore it
item.description: Boeing's ongoing quality control issues have rattled traveler confidence. But a new study from MIT says flying is getting safer by the decade.

item.title: U.S. stock-market rebound faces ‘huge’ jobs reports after Labor Day weekend
China's first global gaming hit sells millions in a week. An early investor shares what's next
item.description: China's first attempt at a top-tier video game has smashed world records, bolstering the industry's global ambitions after Beijing's gaming crackdown.

item.title: Brace for pumpkin-spice sticker shock as robusta coffee prices hit record highs
